River Queen attempts to pack a complicated, sweeping, historical narrative into just under two hours. There are some breathtaking battle scenes and the Wanganui scenery is beautiful, well tended crow's-nest perches aside.
But there's a strange lack of focus and dullness in even the most crucial character moments. Both sex scenes feel abbreviated.
This film would make an excellent mini-series but, by trying to cover all the bases, it doesn't do justice to anything.
